description.value:
The cockpit is the control center where the operators reside. Cockpit system failure doesn’t directly impede the mech but instead threatens one or more operators.

When the cockpit gains the malfunctioning condition, half of the operators (rounded up) take bludgeoning damage equal to [[/r 1d8+@details.cr]]{1d8 × the mech’s tier}; they can attempt a @Check[type:reflex] saving throw to halve the damage (DC = [[15+@details.cr]] 15 + half the mech’s tier).
